Name: Sensation
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker (just to bruise).
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice.
History: The Sensation notably appeared in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
